programme.desc: Taiwan's famed host, James, takes you on a market adventure packed with local delicacies. Join foodies experts to reconnect with nostalgic flavours you've never forgotten.

programme.desc: The top 9 contestants take on a battle of duets and this time, it's with relatives & friends as they contend for the top 8 seats! Shinee & friend perform Elisa Chan's classic canto hit.

programme.title: Go! Travel Trio! Ep06
programme.desc: As three men travel across Taiwan, expect world-class itineraries, the best local culture, and wining & dining, enjoyed with friends.

programme.title: Tuesday Report: Where The Tides Meet Ep03
programme.desc: As a maritime nation, livelihoods in Singapore are inextricably linked to the sea. This three-part series captures the ecological changes in the sea which affects fish-rearing activities.

programme.title: Body SOS S10 Ep16
programme.desc: Delve into various health issues & debunk myths at this 'medical court', where a jury of artists share their thoughts & raise questions throughout trials with the judges - medical experts.

programme.desc: Discover two National Intangible Cultural Heritage inductees originated from China & South India - the lion dance & the traditional Hindu dance Bharatha-natyam.

programme.title: Shaolin Abbot
programme.desc: Alongside the equally famous Lo Lieh, superstar David Chiang plays noble warrior monk Chih Shim, the monk who saved the Southern Shaolin Temple.

programme.title: Heaven Sword and Dragon Sabre
programme.desc: This Yuan Dynasty tale tells of the Sacred Fire sect, Wu Tang clan, O Mei's disciples, a sacred book, and the destruction of Shaolin.

programme.title: Return of the Crazy Bumpkins
programme.desc: After Ah Niu gets out of jail, he gets involved again with his crooked Uncle Chou and caught in other rackets and silly situations.

programme.title: Sunset
programme.desc: What starts off as a musical romp turns into something more akin to a Shakespearean tragedy than a beach-babe party. Starring Ching Li.

programme.title: The Mighty One
programme.desc: The famed Ivy Ling Po plays a mysterious swordswoman, who teams up with the Roving Knight in a battle against a string of intimidating villains.

programme.title: Empress Wu
programme.desc: This splendid, award-winning film features Li Li Hua as the Empress Wu Tse-tien, the most powerful woman in China's four thousand year history.

programme.title: The Kid With the Golden Arm
programme.desc: Director Chang Cheh reunites the Five Venoms in his second biggest cult hit in the West, featuring Lo Meng's most memorable performance.

programme.title: Na Cha the Great
programme.desc: A young rebel goes into legend after being reincarnated to save his people from their tyrannical emperor.

programme.title: The Twin Swords
programme.desc: Martial arts star Jimmy Wang Yu plays Kwei Wu, who unites with his wife Kan to battle kidnappers at the Red Lotus Temple.

programme.title: Tragic Commitment
programme.desc: After a guilty Alex confesses his affair to Tung, his injured wife, she somehow ends up living with Alex's mother and his mistress under the same roof!

programme.title: Rivals of Kung Fu
programme.desc: Watch as rival kung-fu schools try to sabotage Fei-hung's superior Pao Chih Lin clinic until the chivalrous philanthropist shows them the error of their ways.

programme.title: Lover's Rock
programme.desc: This award-winning film is Cheng Pei Pei's screen debut, and depicts life and love in a fishing village captured by two pairs of young lovers.

programme.title: Death Valley
programme.desc: Martial arts maestro Lo Wei wrote, directed and co-starred in this tale of greed and lust for financial gain that depicts a family brought to its knees.

programme.title: The Cave of Silken Web
programme.desc: Seven seductive Spiders lie in wait for our faithful heroes in the third installment of the Shaw Brothers adaptation of Journey to the West.

programme.title: Oath of Death
programme.desc: When Sung Dynasty patriot Chin Liang runs afoul of a corrupt acquaintance, he is forced to avenge the villain's treachery via a self-sacrificing oath.

programme.title: The Mirror and the Lichee
programme.desc: The film's curious title refers to two props that signal a happy beginning to what develops into a tragic love story, linking a scholar and a local beauty.

programme.title: The Sword of Swords
programme.desc: After a master passes on his magical weapon to his top student, a jealous rival goes and kidnaps the man's fiance.

programme.title: Passing Flickers
programme.desc: This comedy contains dramatisations of some of the funniest and most surreal film gossips of director Li Han-Hsiang's 30 year career.

programme.title: Temple of the Red Lotus
programme.desc: When the family that a man named Wu (Jimmy Wang Yu) marries into comes under repeated attack, he suspects that his in-laws are bandits.

programme.title: The Kingdom and the Beauty
programme.desc: Catch superstar, Linda Lin Dai, in one of her most acclaimed roles in this story of forbidden love between a country maiden and the emperor.

programme.title: Pale Passion
programme.desc: Chiang Li Ping plays a scorned wife, while Elaine Chin Yen Ling is the mistress who teaches the hypocritical husband that what goes around, comes around.

programme.title: Duel for Gold
programme.desc: Famed director Chor Yuen has three pairs of cunning crooks on a quest to steal a million gold taels from the Fu Lai Treasury House but one is undercover.

programme.title: Torrent of Desire
programme.desc: Flames of lust burn strongly in this high-octane melodrama that stars Jenny Hu, Yang Fan and Qiao Zhuang.

programme.title: Ambush
programme.desc: This intriguing action flick blends westerns and detective films in its martial arts mainline, depicting a tale of vigilante justice versus the law.

programme.title: The Warlord
programme.desc: Michael Hui Kwun-Man makes a hilarious film debut as the nuttiest warlord of early 20th Century China! Also stars Lily Ho, Hu Chin and Tina Ti.

programme.title: Vengeance of a Snow Girl
programme.desc: Enjoy Lo Wei's very last Shaw Brothers film, the fabulous tale featuring Li Ching of a frostbitten swordswoman out to get her parents' murderers.

programme.title: The Lady Hermit
programme.desc: A pair of female martial artists end up banding together to go up against the evil Black Demon. Starring Cheng Pei Pei.

programme.title: Fast Fingers
programme.desc: Hsu Hsia, a great kung fu actor himself, both directs and leads a team of four martial arts choreographers in his hilarious tale of 'kung fu pickpockets.'

programme.title: Kidnap Ding Ding Don
programme.desc: 2015 HKFA Best Supporting Actress & Best New Performer Ivana Wong pairs up with Alex Fong, who plays an amnesiac kidnapper falling for his hostage.

programme.title: Killer Limo
programme.desc: Full of sword fights and action-packed sequences, catch this exciting crime-action about a young woman who seeks revenge against criminal organizations who killed his father in Thailand.

programme.title: The Founding of an Army
programme.desc: This HKFA nominee tells the epic story behind the founding of the People's Liberation Army in China that ultimately laid the foundation for a new republic. Featuring 60 all-star cast members!

programme.title: My Alien Girlfriend
programme.desc: Yuen Qiu, Susan Shaw & Law Kar Ying star in this comedy about Angela, who comes to earth for the first time to look for her brother, who came looking for love. But it is her who finds it in a kind man.

programme.title: Miao Miao
programme.desc: An awkward young beauty enchants her outgoing classmate. Unfortunately, she falls in love with a someone else instead and decides to quietly pursue him.

programme.title: Firestorm
programme.desc: When an armored car is hijacked in broad daylight, it sparks a wave of bloody heists. To stop the ruthless group of robbers, an inspector finds himself resorting to playing dirty.

programme.title: Pandora's Box
programme.desc: In this Stephen Chow vehicle, a once divine but now human Monkey King needs the titular box to send him back in time.

programme.title: The Rescue
programme.desc: An accident at an offshore drilling platform results in the call for the Transportation Emergency Response Team to save the survivors before the site collapses.

programme.title: All's Well, End's Well 2011
programme.desc: Claire works for Sammy, the CEO of a cosmetics company. She has a shot at a better life when a billionaire pursues her and asks Sammy for help- without realizing her feelings for him.

programme.title: Special Female Force
programme.desc: Shot in Malaysia, this action comedy starring Eliza Sam, Joyce Cheng & Jeana Ho sees six female police recruits developing a bond as they bust crime in bikinis.

programme.title: Sisterhood
programme.desc: This award-winning film delves into same-sex relationships with its depiction of the romance between two women in Macau. Starring Gigi Leung, Fish Liew & Jennifer Yu.

programme.title: Home Sweet Home
programme.desc: When a school bus driver is injured after risking his life to save a boy during an accident, the boy's father invites him to live with them. However, disturbing facts soon begin to emerge.

programme.title: True Legend
programme.desc: Su Can, the Qing Dynasty's top general, returns to his hometown - but when his wife is killed & his family falls victim to a conspiracy, his salvation may lie in the Drunken Fist.

programme.title: The Empty Hands
programme.desc: Stephy Tang plays the half-Chinese, half-Japanese daughter of a karate master, who discovers upon her father's death that she must share ownership of his prized dojo with a disgraced former pupil.

programme.title: All U Need is Love
programme.desc: When a luxury hotel in Hong Kong suddenly becomes a Coronavirus superspreader, guests & the staff are faced with a 14-day trial they may not survive.

programme.title: Girl of the Big House
programme.desc: Starring Francis Ng, Miriam Yeung & Yuen Chau, this action comedy depicts how a bright little girl turns the tables on her uncle who has kidnapped her.

programme.title: Till We Meet Again
programme.desc: A man blames himself for his mother's death, leading him to depression and panic disorder. Adapted from Steven Ma's true-life experience.

programme.title: Girls VS Gangsters
programme.desc: Xi Wen is getting married! Throwing her a wild bachelorette party in Vietnam are Xi Wen's best friends, Kimmy & the glamourous Jia Lan. Will it be the awesome night they imagine?

programme.title: Sword Master
programme.desc: Director Derek Yee reproduces a 40-year old masterpiece & garners five HKFA award nominations for it. This dazzler stars Lin Geng Xin, Peter Ho & Jiang Yi Yan.

programme.title: Love Endures
programme.desc: In this 6-time 2016 ICFF nominee, Liu Kai Chi won his first MTFF Golden Butterfly Best Actor award playing an intellectually-challenged father raising his child.

programme.title: Legend of the Demon Cat
programme.desc: Starring Huang Xuan & Liu Hao Ran, this winner of five awards tells the legend of a demon cat who disrupts the peace during the Tang Dynasty, causing a series of strange events.

programme.title: King of Mahjong
programme.desc: This Singaporean-Malaysian comedy starring Chapman To & Mark Lee revolves around Tin Ba, whose winning streak inspires him to challenge the King of Mahjong in the world championship.

programme.title: Find Your Voice
programme.desc: Renowned conductor Yin Tze Long agrees to lead a pilot program training 3 underperforming school choirs to participate in an inter-school choral competition.

programme.title: Hotel Soul Good
programme.desc: After her boyfriend and job are stolen by her best friend, Mei Qi is hit by a fragment of a meteor, which gives her the ability to see three elderly spirits who need her help to fulfill their last wishes.

programme.title: Peace Breaker
programme.desc: Aaron Kwok & Wang Qian Yuan, two Best Actor award winners, do battle in this Chinese thriller about a corrupt cop who accidentally kills a person and sets in motion one of the worst days of his life.

programme.title: Happiness
programme.desc: Depicting a bond between a teen & a woman suffering from Alzheimer's, Kara Hui & Carlos Chan won the 2015 MIFF Best Actress & Best Supporting Actor awards.

programme.title: Rocky Balboa
programme.desc: The Academy Award-winning Rocky franchise sees former heavyweight champion Rocky Balboa steps out of retirement and back into the ring again.

programme.title: Sleepy Hollow
programme.desc: Johnny Depp plays a fearless constable who has to confront the horrifying legend of the Headless Horseman in this Tim Burton-directed horror.

programme.title: Last Christmas
programme.desc: Kate, who works as an elf at a year-round holiday shop, faces an endless streak of bad luck and poor decision-making until she meets Tom, a man with a mysterious past who challenges her cynical world view.

programme.title: Hollywood on Set S1 Ep937
programme.desc: Go behind the scenes of three major motion pictures per week; catch action footage and interviews with actors and filmmakers.

programme.title: The Angry Birds Movie 2
programme.desc: When a threat emerges that puts Bird and Pig Islands in danger, Red, Chuck, Bomb and Mighty Eagle recruit Chuck's sister and team up with pigs to forge an unsteady truce to save their homes.

programme.title: Deep Impact
programme.desc: A veteran shuttle pilot embarks on a dangerous one-shot space mission to prevent a giant comet from colliding with the Earth.

programme.title: Bad Boys for Life
programme.desc: The Bad Boys Mike Lowrey (Will Smith) and Marcus Burnett (Martin Lawrence) are back together for one last ride in the highly anticipated Bad Boys for Life.

programme.title: Jack Reacher
programme.desc: A homicide investigator digs deeper into a case involving a trained military sniper who shot five random victims.

programme.title: Jack Reacher: Never Go Back
programme.desc: Tom Cruise reprises his role as Jack Reacher who risks everything to take down a massive government conspiracy when an Army Major is framed for treason.

programme.title: Top Gun
programme.desc: Tom Cruise aims high as he vies to be the best Navy fighter pilot. A classic of the 80s that made Cruise a star.

programme.title: Batman V Superman: Dawn of Justice
programme.desc: Amidst the war between Batman and Superman, a new threat arises, putting mankind in an unimaginably great danger.

programme.title: Wonder Woman 1984
programme.desc: Wonder Woman squares off against the Cheetah, a villainess who possesses superhuman strength and agility.

programme.title: Folklore S2 Ep01
programme.desc: This Asian horror anthology series features scary stories based on the deeply-rooted superstitions and folkloric myths across six Asian countries.

programme.title: 13 Hours
programme.desc: A true story of six elite ex-military operators who face overwhelming odds when terrorists attack a U.S. diplomatic compound in Benghazi, Libya.

programme.title: Species II
programme.desc: A trio of American astronauts becomes instant heroes but back on their ship, something else has set its sights on Earth.

programme.title: Species III
programme.desc: The most genetically perfect alien seeks to repopulate her kind while the military attempts to end the war between mankind and human-alien hybrids forever.

programme.title: Christmas With the Darlings
programme.desc: When an assistant gives her final notice, she is drawn into helping the charming, younger brother of her wealthy boss as he looks after his orphaned nieces and nephew through Christmas.

programme.title: Alvin and the Chipmunks: the Road Chip
programme.desc: Believing that they will be abandoned by their human friend after he proposes to his girlfriend, the chipmunks have three days to stop the proposal.

programme.title: Shrek the Third
programme.desc: When the King falls ill, Shrek has to find and train an heir apparent while Princess Fiona fends off Prince Charming's advances.

programme.title: Charlie's Angels
programme.desc: With the world's smartest, bravest, and highly trained women all over the globe, there are now teams of Angels guided by multiple Bosleys taking on the toughest jobs everywhere.

programme.title: 13 Hours
programme.desc: A true story of six elite ex-military operators who face overwhelming odds when terrorists attack a U.S. diplomatic compound in Benghazi, Libya.

programme.title: Wild Mountain Thyme
programme.desc: Two star-crossed lovers in Ireland get caught up in their family's land dispute as John Patrick Shanley, who created the classic Moonstruck, brings his sweeping romantic vision to the Emerald Isle.

programme.title: Fast Five
programme.desc: Vin Diesel and Paul Walker lead a reunion of returning all-stars in the biggest thrill ride of this explosive franchise built on speed.

programme.title: Wonder Woman 1984
programme.desc: Wonder Woman squares off against the Cheetah, a villainess who possesses superhuman strength and agility.

programme.title: Who's by Your Side S1 Ep09
programme.desc: The ten-episode one-hour series explores relationship issues and marital challenges, and depicts painful dilemmas for the characters through a unique lens on their daily lives.

programme.title: Folklore S2 Ep02
programme.desc: This Asian horror anthology series features scary stories based on the deeply-rooted superstitions and folkloric myths across six Asian countries.

programme.title: World War Z
programme.desc: A former United Nations employee attempts to protect his family and all civilization from the pandemic outbreak that threatens their survival.

programme.desc: Drew and Jonathan help newlywed empty nesters downsize for their new life together.

programme.desc: David Bromstad helps a fun-loving Staten Island couple find their forever home in quiet and relaxed Bethany Beach, Delaware.

programme.desc: Pirates Alex, Julia, Julius and Chick-ARR-letta, are sent sailing into the desert and get lost! It's up to the PAW Patrol to save these Land pirates.

programme.title: Paw Patrol S7 Ep719
programme.desc: Mayor Goodway dreams she's travelled to the mysterious Cluck Cluck Island-a very strange land where Chickaletta is royalty!

programme.title: Paw Patrol S1 Ep102
programme.desc: There's a beached baby whale in Adventure Bay! Can the Paw Patrol work together to reunite it with its mother?

programme.title: Blue's Clues & You S2 Ep206
programme.desc: Welcome to Blue's Bistro - a very fancy restaurant! While playing Blue's Clues to figure out what Blue wants to eat, we help Josh take our friends' orders and skidoo to Farmer Goat for fresh vegetables!

programme.title: Blaze and the Monster Machines S5 Ep505
programme.desc: Pickle is putting on a magic show for all of Axle City! But when Crusher accidentally makes a magical mistake, it's up to Blaze and Pickle to fix the magic and save their friends! Abra-ka-Pickle!

programme.title: Santiago of the Seas S1 Ep108
programme.desc: After finding a cosmic treasure map, Santiago and crew take to the stars to track the treasure down. // During a high seas scuffle, Kiko and Sir Butterscotch swap places!

programme.title: Elly & Epit 2013 Telemovie
programme.desc: Uncle Johari menerima tawaran sebagai Cupcake Chef daripada Hotel 5 Bintang di Australia. Isterinya menghadapi tekanan ketiadaan Uncle Jo. Nabilo datang memberikan bantuan. Jom Saksikannya.

programme.title: Klik Siri 2 Ep06
programme.desc: Pelajar-pelajar 'KLIK' kembali untuk musim kedua! Tujuh pelajar lama kini disertai dengan tiga lagi pelajar baru yang mempunyai watak dan pandangan yang berbeza dalam hampir semua perkara.

programme.title: Impian Papa S2 Ep04

programme.title: Geng Bas Sekolah S5 Ep09

programme.title: Cuak! Ep02
programme.desc: 3 orang adik-beradik pulang ke kampung untuk mencari atuk mereka yang hilang.Semua penduduk kampung mempercayai yang atuk mereka telah meninggal dunia kecuali opah.Apa yang terjadi pada atuk?

programme.title: Global View
programme.desc: This in-depth analytic news bulletin reports on major news events around the world from an unbiased perspective.

programme.title: Fun Abroad S3
programme.desc: In this new season, join TVB artists as they show you how to maximize short holidays in Finland, Hawaii, Okinawa, Shanghai, Chiang Mai, Bangkok, Kenting, Norway and Malta.

programme.title: Jimmy Lo Special 2016
programme.desc: Recapture the sweetest days with this special concert that celebrates the music of Jimmy Lo, famed HK songwriter of the 80's.

programme.title: Grow Grow Grow With You
programme.desc: Three former TVB kids show hosts reunite to share wonderful memories. They also visit several schools to show today's students the games they once used to play.

programme.title: Lo and Behold Ep1422
programme.desc: Revolving around the Hung family, this long-running, award-winning TVB sitcom reflects on life today and how love and humour can bridge the generation gap.

programme.title: Global Rhythm 2021
programme.desc: Catch the latest music videos from across the globe in this daily music programme.

programme.title: Story of Yanxi Palace Ep70
programme.desc: Charmaine Sheh stars in this mega-hit drama depicting a street-smart girl who rises in the ranks to become one the Qing Emperor's favourite concubines as she seeks the truth behind her sister's death.

programme.title: Delivery From Taiwan
programme.desc: Join host Nina Liang as she takes you in search of unique Taiwanese souvenirs. From pineapple cakes to egg rolls and handicrafts, discover Taiwan's best products and specialty gifts.

programme.title: Ghost Broadcaster
programme.desc: In this TVB variety show, young artists join supernatural consultants at paranormal hotspots in TVB City. Investigate urban legends in studios, costume streets, dressing rooms and warehouses.

programme.title: Family Feud
programme.desc: Based on the American gameshow format and hosted by Johnson Lee, this HK remake features two celebrity teams racing to provide popular answers to questions for cash and prizes.

programme.title: Neighborhood Treasures S9
programme.desc: This season, artists are treated to street snacks and sake while watching interesting Japanese videos to answer tricky, unexpected questions and also challenge the claw machine to win prizes.

programme.title: Good Morning Hong Kong
programme.desc: This news bulletin keeps you ahead with breaking HK and international news, current affairs, finance, sports, weather and traffic updates.

programme.title: Golden Faith Ep34
programme.desc: Starring Gallen Lo, Deric Wan, Jessica Hester Hsuan, Raymond Lam, and Anne Heung, this drama captures a touching family story set against the gold business.

programme.title: Lo and Behold Ep1422
programme.desc: Revolving around the Hung family, this long-running, award-winning TVB sitcom reflects on life today and how love and humour can bridge the generation gap.

programme.title: Revel in Retirement
programme.desc: Addressing Hong Kong's retirement issues, this program provides retirees with relevant information on health management, how to navigate aging, financial planning and retirement locations.

programme.title: TVB 54th Anniversary Gala
